TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ConsoleCancelEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ConsoleCancelEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ConsoleCancelEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以將主控台應用程式處理序中斷，同時按下輔助按鍵和主控台按鍵 (Ctrl + C)，或輔助按鍵和 Break 主控台按鍵 (Ctrl + Break)。A user can interrupt a console application process by simultaneously pressing the modifier key and the console key (Ctrl+C), or the modifier key and the Break console key (Ctrl+Break). .NET Framework 會因此提供物件的事件處理常式事件，以指定是否應該取消這項程序。The .NET Framework consequently provides a object to the event handler for the event to specify whether the process should be cancelled. 如果屬性設定為`true`事件處理常式中繼續處理程序; 處理序終止，否則為。If the property is set to `true` in the event handler, the process is resumed; otherwise, the process is terminated. 根據預設，windows 7屬性是`false`，並在處理序終止。By default, the value of the property is `false`, and the process terminates. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用類別來處理事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Cancel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Cancel : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出同時按 輔助按鍵和 主控台按鍵 (Ctrl+C) 或 Ctrl+Break 鍵是否會結束目前處理序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether simultaneously pressing the modifier key and the console key (Ctrl+C) or the Ctrl+Break keys terminates the current process.

summary.span: 預設值為 ，這會終止目前的處理序。

span.span: The default is , which terminates the current process.

value.span: 如果事件處理常式結束時應該繼續目前處理序，則為 ，如果應該結束目前處理序，則為 。

span.span: if the current process should resume when the event handler concludes; if the current process should terminate.

value.span: 預設值為 ；當事件處理常式傳回時，目前的處理序會終止。

span.span: The default value is ; the current process terminates when the event handler returns.

value.span: 如果 ，則目前的處理序繼續執行。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會自動初始化為`false`時的處理常式叫用事件。The property is automatically initialized to `false` when the handler for the event is invoked. 值屬性的事件處理常式完成時判斷目前的處理序繼續或終止。The value of the property when the event handler finishes determines whether the current process resumes or terminates. 在設定作業中按下 Ctrl + C 之後，請指定`true`表示事件處理常式結束時時，應該繼續目前的處理序或`false`表示應該終止目前的處理序。In a set operation after Ctrl+C is pressed, specify `true` to indicate that the current process should resume when the event handler concludes, or `false` to indicate that the current process should terminate. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來處理事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，嘗試設定屬性設如果使用者按下 Ctrl + Break 會擲回所叫用事件例外狀況。

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], attempting to set the property to if the event was invoked by the user pressing Ctrl+Break threw an exception.

para.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，您可以設定屬性設使用者按下 Ctrl + Break] 和 [取消應用程式終止之後。

span.span: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], you can set the property to after the user presses Ctrl+Break and cancel the termination of the application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SpecialKey As ConsoleSpecialKey
public: property ConsoleSpecialKey SpecialKey { ConsoleSpecialKey get(); };

summary.span: 取得中斷目前處理序的輔助和主控台組合鍵。

span.span: Gets the combination of modifier and console keys that interrupted the current process.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定中斷目前處理序的按鍵組合。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies the key combination that interrupted the current process.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來處理事件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to handle an event. [!code-cpp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cpp/ckp.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/cs/ckp.cs#1)] [!code-vb[console.cancelkeypress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/console.cancelkeypress/vb/ckp.vb#1)]
